date_valid_datetime: With this function you can check a datetime value to see if it is valid (returns true) or not (returns false). Note that this function will only consider a valid datetime as being after 1/1/1970 and anything before that will return false, so the earliest you can check would be:
date_valid_datetime(year, month, day, hour, minute, second);
This will set "mydatetime" to 15th September 2011, 10:03.30, if it is a valid value (which it is).
